<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_snc_table_saw_filter_section"> <x_snc_table_saw_filter_section action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <filter_source>related_list</filter_source> <name>Order By</name> <number>FLS0001010</number> <order>100</order> <script><![CDATA[/* Available variables: table - table associated with the table view
Result variable: answer - array of filter objects, each index in the following format: { filterID = [HTML ID for the field], filterName = [HTML Name for the field], filterQuery = [encodedQuery string to apply when filter is active], filterIcon = [displayName of an image field(only for icon-type sections)]} */]]></script> <sys_created_by>ben.hollifield@snc_SHARE_SHARE</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-08-19 14:54:39</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7125ef580f4202007a2b778ce1050e79</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.hollifield@snc_SHARE_SHARE</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-08-26 18:56:28</sys_updated_on> <table_view display_value="Knowledge">09f4af580f4202007a2b778ce1050eef</table_view> <type>radio_buttons</type> </x_snc_table_saw_filter_section> </record_update>
